channel.title: Posts on Ajdin Trejić
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ajdin Trejić

item.title: HackTheBox Traceback Write Up w/o Metasploit
item.description: Traceback is an easy Linux box created by Xh4H. You have to enter a shell planted on the server, enter as webadmin, escalate privileges with lua/luvit to sysadmin and echo a reverse shell in 00-header file to get root access.

item.title: Building Worklog: a PERN stack web application
item.description: Building a web based application using PostgreSQL for database, ExpressJS for routing and ReactJS for front end. This app is supposed to help medium sized businesses automate the boring work.

item.title: CSRF Token Extraction
item.description: Extracting tokens from victim using XSS for fun.
